title: eSports club Stuttgart sucht D4+ Spieler f√ºr die 2. Division der ESL Meisterschaft!
body:
eSports club Stuttgart (e Sports club based in Germany - Stuttgart) looking for a top laner to compete in the ESL Meisterschaft 2nd Division.

Current team:

Team Manager: SeS Invisible

Coach: -

Top: -

Jungle: Gramunyy

Mid: Seguleh Zero

ADC: Z Ø D I Å C

SUPP: Errorkiller

Requirements to join our team:

- at least D4 in EUW

- from Europe

- competitive champion pool

- the goal to join the first Division in the summer split

- at least 16 years old

- you need discord + mic

- fluent english (Deutsch)

- **top laner**

if you are interested add me ingame: SeS Invisible
